parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check whether given uniform can be dressed by target soldier.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[isUniformAllowed]] type

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> type: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_canUse = _unit [[isUniformAllowed]] "U_B_CombatUniform_mcam";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addUniform]], [[forceAddUniform]], [[removeUniform]], [[uniform]]
</value></part></template></root>
